panels.description: rate of committed transactions for each node in this network
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: lower is better, no data when all nodes consensus with round 0.
panels.title: consensus_round_cost

alert.message: exec time is greater than consensus time
alert.name: consensus_p90 alert

targets.expr: avg(histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(muta_consensus_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le, instance))) / avg(histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(muta_consensus_time_cost_seconds_bucket{type="exec"}[5m])) by (le, instance)))

panels.description: lower is better. Number of blocks generated by the synchronization
panels.title: synced_block

panels.description: Estimate the network message arrival rate in the last five minutes

targets.expr:
(
  # broadcast_count * (instance_count - 1)
  sum(increase(muta_network_message_total{target="all", direction="sent"}[5m])) * (count(count by (instance) (muta_network_message_total)) - 1)
  # unicast_count
  + sum(increase(muta_network_message_total{target="single", direction="sent"}[5m]))
) 
/
# received_count
(sum(increase(muta_network_message_total{direction="received"}[5m])))

panels.title: network_message_arrival_rate

panels.description: The right number should be total number of consensus peers minus 1 (Itself). For example, 9 consensus peers, then the right number should be 8.
panels.title: Connected Consensus Peers (Minus itself)
Received messages in processing by ip

panels.description: Processing identify protocol handshake, etc verify chain id.
panels.title: Unidentified Connections

panels.description: Total number of received messages in processing
panels.title: Received messages in processing
